content: {"name": "COMPASSION CHRISTIAN CHURCH (FORMERLY SAVANNAH CHRISTIAN)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Closed December 1st - January 3rd, reopens Wednesday, January 4th*", "email": "", "url": "savannahchristian.com", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "55 Al Henderson Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Savannah", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "31419", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 32.0038693, "longitude": -81.2549378}, "phones": [{"number": "(912) 925-9657", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
